oai_dc:dc.dc:title: RIP - CURRENTS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Noda, Edward K.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: current
rip current
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The generation and stabilization of rip - current circulation patterns is considered herein. An analytic model is developed to simulate the wave hydrodynamic processes in the nearshore zone, strongly influenced by the local bottom topography. The wave induced nearshore circulation pattern is computed and the results compared to prototype field data.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 13 (1972): Proceedings of 13th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Vancouver, Canada, 1972.; 32
